archimate:BusinessObject.name: PLANT Domain CDM
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
The PLANT domain contains data defining the equipment and methods required to manufacture a medicine, the maintenance histories of machines, and raw data generated from them. Data in the PLANT domain is high frequency real-time data (i.e. millisecond latency), not immediately consumable in a business context. Events are machine readable but not necessarily human readable. The domain aligns with ISA-88 standards on batch control and machine interoperability.
Data in the PLANT domain includes:​
- Objects to support the interoperability of manufacturing and lab equipment used in the production process, and their maintenance histories​.
- The processes and configurations employed by manufacturing and lab equipment to make a medicine​
- Low level telemetry data generated by manufacturing and lab equipment during the production process, including sensor alarms.
